about_the_game:
"Fried Chicken Wings Cause a Love Fire" is a BL mystery comedy long visual novel. It uses the first-person perspective with a fixed protagonist, Aris, and includes elements of horror and sexual innuendo.

Story Background:

The world is divided into three tiers: the luxurious and wasteful Upper Layer, the competitive Middle Layer, and the chaotic Lower Layer. Aris, once the heir to an Upper-Layer family, is now just one of the fry cooks at a fried chicken shop.

Determined to do whatever it takes to return to the Upper Layer, all his plans are interrupted by a mysterious night—a forceful kiss from his boss, an encounter with a death row inmate, and an attack by resurrected corpses.

Upon waking, Aris must confront the shadows from his past.

Character Introduction:

1.Bryant：

He was Aris's boss, a smart, calm manager. Was Aris's childhood sweetheart and first love.

2.Deacon：

He was Aris's best friend, went to prison for him, and was later sentenced to death for killing Upper-Layer nobles. He was extremely unstable and suffered from mental illness.

3.Caeran：

He is the corpse Aris encounters and also the one who attacks Aris, claiming amnesia and full of mystery.

Game Features:

  • Rich Story:

    Three routes with completely different experiences, featuring a variety of characters with distinct personalities. Over two hours of gameplay.

  • Fragment and Dice System:

    Accumulate "fragments" through choices and roll dice at crucial moments to determine the direction of the story!

  • "Reverse" Endings:

    The game includes a multitude of endings, with special Neutral Ends (NE) that can be reversed by using special fragments to unlock the corresponding New Ends (NewEND), opening up new possibilities.

  • Other Features:

    Achievements, four galleries, blinkable character arts, timer options, anytime rollback, auto-save, and other convenient features.

Content Warning:

Cannibalism, suicide, hypnosis, profanity, gory depictions, mental breakdown. For ages 18 and up. Please download and play after careful confirmation.

Additional Information:

The demo version includes the first six chapters of three characters, and it will be updated after each major release. After the game is completed, the demo will be re-uploaded and made available for purchase.
